loc.data: These settings are predefinitions used to improve and accelerate the publishing process. You, however, change these settings any time and during the actual publishing procedure. Each of these settings have influence on the way your work become visible, makes money, and is spread through the community. The basic rule is that you get more attention, make more money, and have more success the less restricted your work is.
Common settings for '{0}'
Regular sale on a 'per piece' base
Regular sale on a 'per piece' base
There is no package for this project
This project has no package. Select one from list below or create a new suitable one.
This project currently has the package {0} assigned
Set and adjust the pricing for the content created within the project {0}.

As the project's owner you can set a base price tag. This is what you will get from each sale. The final pricing for those who buy will be different. Cost of production, shipping (if applicable), media conversion, and other related variable cost will be added automatically.

Based on the price tag provided above the author and the contributors can negotiate a share. If the author pays the contributors a fixed or hourly salary it is not necessary to share the revenues. Contributors must confirm the share before the project becomes publishable.
Each project can contain one or more content containers (work). The team members can get distinct shares for each of these containers.
There is no marketing package and hence no price tag.
This page show your current revenues per time and per work.
Select content you wish to copy from
For this content project are several workrooms available. Choose one available for the roles you have in the team. Your are editing {0}
For this content project are several workrooms available. Choose one available for the roles you have in the team. Your are editing {0}. Choose the appropriate tool from the task pane at the right.
Missing a tool? Try adding appropriate roles to your profile.
These properties manage the global matching of all content. Authors can overwrite these settings on paragraph level.
Click icon bar to see more details
Choose an option for this milestone
Choose an option for this milestone

You're currently working with Workroom {0}. The list below shows all milestones. You can change the state for those milestones you're currently responsible. As a team lead you can delegate the responsibilty to somebody else from your team.

You're currently working with Workroom {0}. The list below shows all milestones. You can change the state for those milestones you're currently responsible for. As a team lead you can delegate the responsibilty to somebody else from your team.
{0} active content in the project.
{0} Members in the {1}
There is no project available. Consider creating a new one.
Project {0}, active since {1}
On this page you can manage all your project's details. Team members can view but not change details.
This section shows current alerts by members, news from team and messages send to the public.
The package {0} has been assigned to this content.
See marketing management to support the publishing.
There is no marketing package assigned
Only the lead author can create a new workspace.

As a lead, create and propose shares with your contributors. Define a base price for content. Any production cost for distinct media will be added automatically. As a contributor, watch pricing and share proposals and confirm or deny.
See resources data or switch to resource management.
This section gives access to the team's discussion board. The discussion board is a private space on a 'per project' base.
Manage semantic data for the project, such as dynamic variables, cites, and abbreviations.
These Terms are additional to the common contract term between lead-author and team members. Each member of the team must approve these terms before the content can be published
Each content workspace is the place where an app is being born and grow up. Start with a new content container and enter everything or create one by uploading content.
Content Workspace and Progress ({0} containers)
This project has already a marketing package with the name {0} assigned.
You're a contributing member of this project.
There is no marketing package assigned yet. The project is not yet publishable.
This project does not yet contain any publishable content. Check milestones, marketing packages, and contributor confirmations.
This project has {0} publishable content containers.
Project Resources ({0} resources)
Team, Jobs and Status ({0} Team Members)
Marketing and Pricing (package '{0}' assigned)
This project is run by Team {0}. This team runs {1} other project. Our team currently has {2} members.
These are previously deactivated projects. You can reactivate or delete finally. Deletion will remove the project, all containing content, resources, teams and teams' data from database.

On this page you can see all projects you're associated with. As a lead-author you can edit the project details and initiate the publishing process. As a participant, such as a co-author or translator, you can view project settings and team members.

You start a new project any time. If you start a project you become a lead-author automatically. You can go further by just start typing or invite others to participate helping to create, style, and lay-out your project.
A project can contain a single container, multiple versions of content, or even works as some sort of unassigned container for simple things such blog articles. You can ran a team or do it yourself.
{0} active content in the project.
{0} Members in the {1}
Project {0}, active since {1}
There are no published works from this project.
Settings to see your work in Google Currents, on Facebook, on MySpace, and several other free promotion features.

Thanks for publishing your work. Our mutual success to market, sell, and distribute depends the information given below to further support this work. The key is to understand what the reader community needs to adopt the work, using the "word of mouse" to let others know that a new sophisticated piece of knowledge has been born.

The core function of our platform is the distribution of content. We strongly recommend to enhance your audience and find new markets by giving other authors access to your content. Be proud of being copied! Copy is not a bad word—it's the best and fastest way to make money. As the lead author you can easily increase your revenues by just opening this work.
These are all recent publishing procedures.

You're about publishing content. Once published the content will be made available immediately to the public according your marketing settings. Subsequent marketing action start after being published. The publish workflow may take some time and you can watch progress and success any time from here
This project contains the following publishable content:
Click here to generate and assign a cover
Package {0} has been selected.
Use this form to describe your work as good as possible. After publishing is done we create an basic app immediately. User will see the app in the public catalogues and can order you work.
Click here to generate a new one.
Click Image to upload new cover
Refine the navigation by converting deeper levels to flat content.
There are no catalogue entries assigned yet.
Click Image to upload custom cover.

Content: This container stores all stuff needed to be embedded into the content. All files here are dirtectly accessible to the authors and they are able to add them in any of the active Opus' of the project
Import: Store all files and resources you wish to import from here. Typically these are MS Word files and images.

Project: The project container stores all files that support the team members. There are no restrictions using these folders, but authors cannot access these files from editor to include the stuff in publishable content. To make drafts created here finally available in the project's output, move or copy the file to the Content container.
On this page you can manage all files and logical resources you and your team needs to create the content of the project {0}.
Trash: The trash container stores all files no longer needed.
Manage abbreviations, cites, definitions, idioms, variables and common links in one place. Organize all sort of terms in termsets to have them handy while writing.
Manage the content of the selected termset.
If acceptable, please specify range for the hourly rates:
Add new contributors to the team {0} for specific roles. Users without contribution roles are not being searchable.
All members in the box below are being added to the team. Enter names directly to ignore search terms.
Click search to see any results.
If you contribute on a hourly base (time and material) or for fixed salery and just finished your milestone, you can now raise an invoice to your team's lead author
This sheet shows all outstanding payments, both due or not due.
In this dialog you can manage your invoices and send new one to your lead author.
In this dialog you can manage your invoices and send new one to your lead author.
As a the team leader click on the description, image, or title areas to change content immediately. Add new team members, invite others, or remove inactive members.
This is the homepage for team {0}. Manage your members and encourage others to participate by pimping your homepage.
See your teams and those you're an active member of currently. Create a new team to become a lead author. You can select your team when you start a new project.
The team is currently {0}. It started at {1}. It has {2} members, and {3} projects.
You're the team's lead author or creator.
{0} Members in this team:

Click a name to add to selection
For which project do you want to rate this contributor?
Really bad, no usable work at all
Metaphysical perfection, far above the average
Slightly usable, most parts are less than expected
Very good, can be used with some additional effort
Really good, contributor worked as expected
Expert level work, professional in any way
The communication skills, responsiveness and speed of reaction.
The rating uses a simple number system:
This describes the style, the way to communicate, the habit while talking to others
The overall quality of the desired work concerning the expectations.
The overall reliability regarding work, schedules, commitments, even outside the regular work.
Please select an offer using the search function.
Template Editor (Click or double click in den text to start working)
Template Editor (Click or double click in the text to start working)
There are no products. Choose a work to create a product from.
Private Apps are specific physical copies of a work. They are designed to appear on a distinct device.
You're about to delete the content of a private app permanently. Please confirm.
Du bist dabei, die Daten einer privaten App zu entfernen. Bitte bestätige das.
Diese Apps wurden bereits vorbereitet, aber nicht bestellt.
These private apps are already prepared for order, but have not been processed so far.
Profil Editor (Click or double click in den text to start working)
It's, however, strongly recommended to be filled in properly if you're an author, translator, copy-editor, or any other contributor on texxtoor.
Click the image to upload one
texxtoor is a social community with smooth interaction to Xing, Friendster, Facebook, and more.

Apart from common business profil data you can use to present yourself you can create a single public profile here. texxtoor takes this an opportunity to make you visible to your friends exactly as you like. This is totally volontary and and can stay empty.

texxtoor is a social community for everybody who want learn or teach in a new, sophisticated, media, device, publisher, and vendor independent way. Network with others, such as readers, authors, and everyone who creates content on texxtoor. Find collegues, fellow students, and co-workers of our partnering publishers.

Just another social network?

No, not really. Yes, actually. But a very special. You don't have to create an expensive profile with texxtoor or even enter everything again something. We pull or your profiles together, whatever you have already in the Web—where you're at home.

What does that mean?

If you're a member at Facebook, MySpace, StudiVZ, Friendster, LinkedIn, or even Xing, than you're already part of the texxtoor community. Just enter the links to your public profiles in the profile page here. Everything what's public is available in texxtoor, everything what's private is kept private for sure.

What can I do with my contacts?

First, all your data may create your new profile. It doesn't matter from what network it's pulled. And, more amazing, texxtoor doesn't copy data. We just link the profiles so you don't have to manage it twice. However, if you don't have a profile elsewhere we offer an amazing easy way to create a profile on texxtoor, see below.

With just a single click you can invite all your friends to become a member of texxtoor, the biggest textbook community on earth. Create private or public groups and use any content together.
Public Profile for {0}

On this page you can participate in discussions and threads independend of actual works. Talk with others about the site, content, wish lists, various themes and whatever you like to talk about with other fellow readers.
Here are your and all public groups that deal with your subjects. Add a subject to your personal profile to see more public groups.
There are no groups. Just start a new group by yourself.
Here you can access members of your groups, public groups, or groups you're the groups' administrator.
Group {0} has {1} members.
You don't has any groups to manage.
These are private groups and those you are permitted to manage.

Private groups can share content online—if one member buys an app online all members will have access to it. Members can share bookmarks, comments, and related resources. Members can send private messages directly to each other. Uploaded content by members will be accessible be all others. All activities within the group are kept private to members.
There are currently now questions and answers.

Find recommendations depending on your profile.

You can search the catalog using the tree view. Enter some text in the field and the catalog is searched immeditately. While searching the tree deflates to a single list.

All apps found are shown in the result pane and you can start using them.
Your keywords (add as many as you like one by one)

Find recommendations depending on your profile.

You can search the catalog using the tree view. Enter some text in the field and the catalog is searched immeditately. While searching the tree deflates to a single list.

All apps found are shown in the result pane and you can start using them.
Just select from the keywords provided by your profile or simply add a new selection.
texxtoor has not just a few apps you can select from. texxtoor has million of variations, built on request for you, a perfect fit to your needs.
No profile data. Consider adding reader profile matrix.
Click an element to remove from keyword filter:
Shows all results in the search.
Tell us which media you like to use
Primarily any content provided by us is free. Some media we create for you individually have a production fee as shown below.
If you pay with PayPal there is no need to add any personal data.
Final pricing includes shipping, assurance, and V.A.T., if applicable
Use the archive function to download electronic items any time after purchase.
This order contains free items only. You can download now or any time later using the archive from your private menu.
This page makes all bookmarks of a specific work accessible. You can view or remove bookmarks.
There are no bookmarks in this work
Select Content from other collections or works.
There are no collections available. You can start by just creating one.

Your private content is organized in collections. Collections contain content for particular subjects. You can create as many collections as you like. Use your collections to create your personal work for reading online, on a tablet, or print out.
This page makes all comments, marks, and tags such as PosIts of a specific work accessible. You can view, edit, or remove comments.
There are no comments or tags in this work
Show peer reviews for this work...

and rated with {0} points

Read on your favorite device or order a printed copy.
Read the public content for free. Put the app into your library to get access to more functions, such as boomarks and private comments.
Discuss this work with others, share your mood, or learn more from other fellow readers.
Each work on texxtoor can be rated and reviews. The title {0} has {1} points. The summary of all ratings looks like this:
You can here start reading or working with the work.
This work is associated with some order. It cannot be removed from library.
This work was not yet ordered.
There is nothing in your library.
Your personal library contains all recently read content, own creations, and private uploads. From here you can download or order apps for any device and even a printed copy.
If you work with a app personally start by creating a private issue.
Have a DropBox account? Just setup here and drop all your EPUBs in one single step. Experience the best textbook reading experience in the Web today in seconds

You can upload works, as long as based on EPUB 2 or EPUB 3. These private works are visible just to you. You can put these works completely or in parts into private collections, combine with other themes and order either printed or electronically.
Your personal library contains all recently read content, own creations, and private uploads. From here you can download or order apps for any device.
If you work with a app personally start by creating a private issue.
Have a DropBox account? Just setup here and drop all your EPUBs in one single step. Experience the best textbook reading experience in the Web today in seconds

You can upload works, as long as based on EPUB 2 or EPUB 3. These private works are visible just to you. You can put these works completely or in parts into private collections, combine with other themes and order either printed or electronically.
New Message to the peer readers

Use the messageboard to discuss the work 'as whole' with your peers.

Any discussion inside the document, related to a particular section or element, should be places as an command inside. The intention of this message board is an overall thread about the work, your experience, success, or general questions the public should know.
Use this page to share anything outside the content level with your fellow readers.

All users can do everything—Reading, Writing, Contributing, or just using. No obligations, always free!

Once the registration has been sent we send a confirmation to the e-mail address given. You can use the account immediately. However, we recommend that you complete your profile to get everything the platform provides.
Account creation was unsuccessful. Please correct the errors and try again.

Send and manage your invoices here
See task for payments and billing options exclusively for authors.
Give others some information about you

You can store business you like to share as well as any private information here. This information is used internally to further tailor your reading experience on texxtoor. Everything is volontary and can be changed or deleted any time. You can participate as an author, designer, translator, or copy-editor creating sophistictad textbooks for any platform. Use this page to offer your services and get the project you desire.
Authors who want to launch there own project use the information given here to find and hire constributors.
You're about to delete an address permanently. Please confirm.
You can assign your default payment settings. For readers how to pay, for authors how to get revenues.
A public profile is already available.
Welcome to texxtoor. Your account is temporarily activated and you can start working immediately.

Working as an author on texxtoor is as easy as 1—2—3. Create—Market—Sell. As an expert you create the content, but marketing and selling is our part. Though, you can change and manage everything. You are the master and you benefit from your work, directly.
Create your text, figures, and apps or just upload your content. With our outstanding editor you can easily create the final content. No software required and for free.
Build a team of authors, illustrators, editors, or translators inviting other experts to your project.
Enhance your work with our sophisticated augmentation technology and optimize the content for PC, Mac, iPad, or Android devices.
Each work gets a Facebook fanpage and a twitter account. Integrate your blog or let as create one for you—always free.
Each app can be accessed online—always up-to-date and with a dirct channel to each reader.
Each app is available on all platforms, mobile or print included, optimized for major tablet platforms.
Each work will be sold in the traditional way, including brick-and-mortar shops, Amazon, and Apple iBookStore.
texxtoor authors get paid—more than from any publisher. We make you success.
texxtoor authors get up to 70% of all revenues, including direct sales, advertisments, and partnerships.
Authors – The Future of Textbook Publishing

Working as an author on texxtoor is as easy as 1—2—3. Create—Market—Sell. As an expert you create the content, but marketing and selling is our part. Though, you can change and manage everything. You are the master and you benefit from your work, directly.
Create your text, figures, and apps or just upload your content. With our outstanding editor you can easily create the final content. No software required and for free.

Each work will be sold in the traditional way, including brick-and-mortar shops, Amazon, and Apple iBookStore.
texxtoor authors get paid—more than from any publisher. We make you success.
texxtoor authors get up to 70% of all revenues, including direct sales, advertisments, and partnerships.

texxtoor provides full support for creation of sophisticated textbooks. Authors can get all support they need such as and quite often much better than a traditional publisher can provide. This includes copy-editing, translation, or co-authoring, but also illustration, video art, and more. If you want to provide such work, just become a member and join one of the teams. Joining the platform and become a member is always free.

Some content project can become a great success. Want participate? Negotiate with the lead-author to get a share of all revenues. It's just one click and our software tracks all shares, from direct sales down to reused portions over several steps. Earn more than you can imagine actually.
If you're just after a regular job, the job center is a great way. Post yourself and look for jobs posted by authors, publishers, and other platform users.

texxtoor is much more than just textbooks. We create interactive learning applications, containing text and figures, active sequences, and videos. The apps are augmented books. Every member can take over any content and make something better out of it. That doesn't bother the authors, because we track the copies and make your success even their success.
You found content full of text, pretty good but hard to read? You're an illustrator. Take it over, make it picturesce, earn money with it. It's so simple!

Each content, directly published on texxtoor, can be read for free. We support each device and create content optimized for this device.
The texxtoor app is available on devices such as iPad, Kindle Fire, PC, Windows 8 tablets, or Mac. Continuous reading, multi media content, and interactions improve the success of learning and make fun.

Learning together makes fun. Create a team and save money! A team can be collegues, students of study group, or pupils of a class, or even just friends. Use the content together, without paying again and again for each copy. Write comments, discuss online, and exchange your thoughts directly.

This all is possbile not only on the app level but down to a single paragraph—this is the future of the classic PostIt.

texxtoor is much more than just textbooks. We create interactive learning applications, containing text and figures, active sequences, and videos. The books gets augmented. Each book is being created just for you—individually. Each book is one of a kind. A selection of content due to subtle and nifty tagged semantic content makes a perfect textbook—your textbook.
And, as always, on the media or device you like most. As a printed copy, on your iPad, your Xoom, or even a simple PC.
Share bookmarks, comments, or even private content. Finf your buddies, discuss difficult subjects, and stay in contact with the authors.

You're in a group of students, a class of pupils, a collegue in a team? Get content for your team and share it, legally, easy, and for free. Create your verys own library and work with the content together, create private copies, add personal content, and get it on any media, even as a printed copy.

texxtoor is much more than just textbooks. We create interactive learning applications, containing text and figures, active sequences, and videos. The app are augmented books. Use this technology to get the content in what you really need. You're a teacher and need a script for your pupils? You are a trainer and want to have something to show to your audience. Just create a group and make the content available, fast, easy, and permanently.
Authors – The Future of Textbook Publishing
